questions.question: A horizontal venturimeter inlet & throat diameter are 27 cm and 14 cm respectively. The hm = 21 cm. The manometer fluid is mercury. Take cd = 0.98. water is flowing through pipe find discharge. Find the discharge. Refer figure from the simulator.

A horizontal venturimeter inlet & throat diameter are 30 cm and 13 cm respectively. The hm = 22 cm. The manometer fluid is mercury. Take cd = 0.98. water is flowing through pipe find discharge. Find the discharge. Refer figure from the simulator.
